            I am a third-year PhD Candidate in Sustainable Development at Columbia University.
            My research stands at the intersection of political economy, empirical industrial organization and environmental economics.
            Before joining Columbia, I earned a Masters degree in Quantitative Economics from the Paris School of Economics and a Bachelor’s degree in Economics and Social Sciences from Paris Sciences et Lettres.
            I also worked for the French Development Agency (AFD) at their Central Asia regional office in Tashkent, Uzbekistan where I was working on energy and water projects.
